notes.title: Author contribution
notes.p: Guarantor of the article: TC had full access to all of the data in the study and guaranteed the integrity of the data and the accuracy of the data analysis. Study concept and design: YW, JL, YY, YC, YZ, TC. Acquisition, analysis and interpretation of data: YW, JL, YY, YF, NY, LG, TC. Drafting of the manuscript: YW, JL, YY, TC. Critical revision of the manuscript for important intellectual content: YW, JL, YF, LG, FJ, YC, YZ, TC. All authors have approved the final draft of the manuscript.
